com.marklogic.mgmt

Class ManageConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marklogic.rest.util.RestConfig
      • com.marklogic.mgmt.ManageConfig

  • public class ManageConfig
extends RestConfig
    Defines the configuration data for talking to the Mgmt REST API. Also includes properties for the admin user, as this user is typically needed for managing resources such as roles and users. If adminUsername and adminPassword are not set, they default to the username/password attribute values.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_PASSWORD 
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_USERNAME
      These are assumed as sensible defaults in a development environment, where teams often use admin/admin for the admin login.
